data.title: Back to the Future (1985)
data.summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

data.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017)
data.summary: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

data.title: Eighth Grade (2018)
data.summary: An introverted teenage girl tries to survive the last week of her disastrous eighth grade year before leaving to start high school.

data.title: The Wolf of Wall Street (2013)
data.summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

data.title: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
data.summary: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

data.title: La La Land (I) (2016)
data.summary: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

data.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014)
data.summary: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

data.title: Deadpool (2016)
data.summary: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

data.title: Deadpool 2 (2018)
data.summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

data.title: BlacKkKlansman (2018)
data.summary: Ron Stallworth, an African-American police officer from Colorado, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan with the help of a white surrogate, who eventually becomes head of the local branch.

data.title: Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
data.summary: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

data.title: Captain Fantastic (2016)
data.summary: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

data.title: The Breakfast Club (1985)
data.summary: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

data.title: The Goonies (1985)
data.summary: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient valuable treasure.

data.title: About Time (I) (2013)
data.summary: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

data.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)
data.summary: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

data.title: Love, Simon (2018)
data.summary: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends, and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.

data.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service (2014)
data.summary: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

data.title: Crazy Rich Asians (2018)
data.summary: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.

data.title: The Old Man & the Gun (2018)
data.summary: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.

data.title: I, Tonya (2017)
data.summary: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

data.title: Lady Bird (2017)
data.summary: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

data.title: The Disaster Artist (2017)
data.summary: When Greg Sestero, an aspiring film actor, meets the weird and mysterious Tommy Wiseau in an acting class, they form a unique friendship and travel to Hollywood to make their dreams come true.

data.title: Sorry to Bother You (2018)
data.summary: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.

data.title: Crazy Stupid Love (2011)
data.summary: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

data.title: Ant-Man (2015)
data.summary: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

data.title: 10 Things I Hate About You (1999)
data.summary: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

data.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again (2018)
data.summary: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.

data.title: American Made (2017)
data.summary: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.

data.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin (2005)
data.summary: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

data.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)
data.summary: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

data.title: Game Night (I) (2018)
data.summary: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

data.title: Tully (2018)
data.summary: A mother of three hires a night nanny to help with her newborn.

data.title: American Pie (1999)
data.summary: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

data.title: We're the Millers (2013)
data.summary: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

data.title: Logan Lucky (2017)
data.summary: Two brothers attempt to pull off a heist during a NASCAR race in North Carolina.

data.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017)
data.summary: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hit man who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

data.title: Juliet, Naked (2018)
data.summary: Juliet, Naked is the story of Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) and her unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

data.title: The Mask (1994)
data.summary: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

data.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017)
data.summary: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

data.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005)
data.summary: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

data.title: Little Italy (2018)
data.summary: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

data.title: Tag (I) (2018)
data.summary: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

data.title: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser (2018)
data.summary: A case of mistaken identity results in unexpected romance when the most popular girl in high school and the biggest loser must come together to win over their crushes.

data.title: EuroTrip (2004)
data.summary: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

data.title: Set It Up (2018)
data.summary: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

data.title: Destination Wedding (2018)
data.summary: The story of two miserable and unpleasant wedding guests, Lindsay and Frank, who develop a mutual affection despite themselves.

data.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me (2018)
data.summary: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.

data.title: Mamma Mia! (2008)
data.summary: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.

data.title: The Sisters Brothers (2018)
data.summary: In 1850s Oregon, a gold prospector is chased by the infamous duo of assassins, the Sisters brothers.

data.title: Ocean's Eight (2018)
data.summary: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

data.title: The Kissing Booth (2018)
data.summary: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

data.title: Blockers (2018)
data.summary: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

data.title: Super Troopers 2 (2018)
data.summary: When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.

data.title: The Festival (2018)
data.summary: After Nick's girlfriend dumps him, his best mate Shane has the perfect antidote to his break-up blues: three days at an epic music festival.

data.title: Bad Moms (2016)
data.summary: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun, and comedic self-indulgence.

data.title: Book Club (2018)
data.summary: Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 Shades of Grey in their monthly book club.

data.title: Like Father (I) (2018)
data.summary: A workaholic woman who is left at the altar takes her honeymoon trip anyway, joined by her overachieving father, who left her mother because he believed his family was holding back his ...                See full summary »

data.title: Gringo (2018)
data.summary: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

data.title: Overboard (I) (2018)
data.summary: A spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and becomes the target of revenge from his mistreated employee.

data.title: Pitch Perfect 3 (2017)
data.summary: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.

data.title: The After Party (2018)
data.summary: When an aspiring rapper goes viral for all the wrong reasons, he thinks his career is over. But when his best friend gets them into a wild NYC after party, he gets one more chance to make the impossible happen.

data.title: Support the Girls (2018)
data.summary: The general manager at a highway-side ''sports bar with curves" has her incurable optimism and faith, in her girls, her customers, and herself, tested over the course of a long, strange day.

data.title: Home Again (2017)
data.summary: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

data.title: Arizona (2018)
data.summary: Set in the midst of the 2009 housing crisis, this darkly comedic story follows Cassie Fowler, a single mom and struggling realtor whose life goes off the rails when she witnesses a murder.

data.title: Baywatch (2017)
data.summary: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

data.title: The Package (II) (2018)
data.summary: When a group of teenage friends go on a spring break camping trip, an unfortunate accident sets off a race against time to save their friend's most prized possession.

data.title: Life of the Party (I) (2018)
data.summary: After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.

data.title: Father Figures (2017)
data.summary: Upon learning that their mother has been lying to them for years about their allegedly deceased father, two fraternal twin brothers hit the road in order to find him.

data.title: Blood Fest (2018)
data.summary: Fans flock to a festival celebrating the most iconic horror movies, only to discover that the charismatic showman behind the event has a diabolical agenda. As festival attendees start dying...                See full summary »

data.title: Blue Iguana (2018)
data.summary: Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse.

data.title: Tusk (2014)
data.summary: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

data.title: The Happytime Murders (2018)
data.summary: When the puppet cast of an '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

data.title: I Feel Pretty (2018)
data.summary: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

data.title: Dad's Army (2016)
data.summary: The Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard platoon deal with a visiting female journalist and a German spy as World War II draws to its conclusion.

data.title: Action Point (2018)
data.summary: A daredevil designs and operates his own theme park with his friends.

data.title: Year One (2009)
data.summary: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

data.title: Johnny English Strikes Again (2018)
data.summary: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

data.title: Holmes and Watson (2018)
data.summary: A humorous take on Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mysteries featuring Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.

data.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
data.summary: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

data.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
data.summary: Plot unknown.

data.title: The Land of Steady Habits (2018)
data.summary: Feeling trapped in the stifling, wealthy enclave of Westport, Connecticut, Anders Hill (Ben Mendelsohn) retires from his job in finance and leaves his wife (Edie Falco) in the hopes that it...                See full summary »

data.title: A Rainy Day in New York
data.summary: Two young people arrive in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.

data.title: Night School (2018)
data.summary: A group of troublemakers are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.
